tweet: Market Outlook #46 is live:  https://t.co/lO3y9k1SiY  I cover the past week's price-action in $BTC, $ETH and $XMR, as usual, plus take a look at where $LTC is with the block reward halvening imminent and an opportunity that may present itself in $GNT.  Enjoy, and please share!
If you're new to cryptocurrency and curious about how the tech works, Mastering Monero is a great introduction  https://t.co/qWeEi33Mot
